title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
**Product Title:** 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles

**Product Description:**

Brighten up someone's life with our beautiful set of 16 scented aromatherapy candles, perfectly suited as a gift for your loved ones, including mothers, wives, daughters, and friends. Each candle is carefully crafted with natural soy wax, infused with essential oils, and carefully selected fragrances to provide a soothing ambiance and a delightful experience.

**Product Features:**

- Set of 16 scented candles with diverse fragrances: Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia
- Made from natural soy wax, a sustainable and eco-friendly material
- Essential oils used for a more authentic and calming experience
- Long-lasting burn time of 18-20 hours per candle
- Presented in recyclable tin cans, perfect for reuse as a flowerpot or home decoration
- Safety guaranteed: keep out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire

**Order Now:**

Gift your loved ones the joy of relaxation and tranquility with our set of 16 scented aromatherapy candles. Perfect for any occasion, our candles will create a soothing ambiance and a delightful experience. Order now and make someone's day a little brighter.

**Product Specifications:**

- Product Name: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle
- Quantity: Set of 16 scented candles
- Material: Natural soy wax
- Fragrances: 16 unique scents
- Burn Time: 18-20 hours per candle
- Container Type: Recyclable tin cans
- Safety Note: Keep out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire
